entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
